title: Dataset Sample Model Annotation
description: An entry with dataset sample object associations

sampleId.description: The IDs for this sample object, MOD or external database ID (ex: GEO); primaryId and secondaryId

sampleTitle.description: free text title of the sample.

abundance.description: free text of amount of sample used

sampleType.description: Ontology ID of the biosample type. EX: total mRNA, OBI:XXXXXXX

sampleAge.description: a collection of terms that when used together represent the age of the sample

items.description: a collection of terms that when used together represents the location within an organism from which the sample was taken

genomicInformation.description: A collection of information that represents the strain or genomic background of the sample, either an id or free text

taxonId.description: taxon id of the organism the sample comes from

sex.description: sex of the organism the sample came from

assayType.description: id of type of assay used for this sample; sample or experiment property?

sequencingFormat.description: single or paired end sequencing; might be better in experiment info

categoryTags.description: list of controlled vocabulary text to describe the experiment

assemblyVersion.description: List of the version(s) of genome the sample's sequence was mapped to

datasetId.description: list of primary dataset id that this sample is associated with, should be in datasetAnnotation.json

microarraySampleDetails.description: collection of information that is specific for microarray samples

dateAssigned.description: Date this entity was assigned in it's primary data source.
